casebody.data:
TOWN OF LITTLETON
v.
LAYNE HEAVY CIVIL, INC. f/d/b/a Reynolds, Inc.; Layne Inliner, LLC f/d/b/a Reynolds Inliner, LLC; and Mack Gay Associates, P.A. No. 322P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 27, 2019 Patricia P. Shields, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Joshua D. Neighbors, Attorney at Law, Rod Malone, Attorney at Law, Kristopher Gardner, Attorney at Law, Linda H. Stephens, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Town of Littleton. Walter E. Brock, Jr., Attorney at Law, Andrew P. Flynt, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Mack Gay Associates, P.A. Leslie C. Packer, Attorney at Law, Stephen D. Feldman, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Steven A. Scoggan, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Layne Heavy Civil, Inc., et al. Julia C. Ambrose, Attorney at Law, Raleigh.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 25th of September 2018 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of March 2019."
